Text: The First Indochina War (generally known as the Indochina War in France, and as the Anti-French Resistance War in Vietnam) began in French Indochina on 19 December, 1946, and lasted until 1 August, 1954.
Triplets:<The First Indochina War

ere are the triplets extracted from the text:

<Text: First Indochina War:  Fighting between French forces and their Viet Minh opponents in the south dated from September 1945.>
Triplets:<First Indochina War
3:
--------------------
Text: First Indochina War:  Most of the fighting took place in Tonkin in northern Vietnam, although the conflict engulfed the entire country and also extended into the neighboring French Indochina protectorates of Laos and Cambodia.
